title: Red Riding Hood and the Wolf
description: Never trust a girl in a red cape carrying a wicker basket through the forest, you might not like what you find. Meet Red Riding Hood, Granny and the Wolf in this hilarious twisted fairytale for young children. Written by best selling author, and Ambassador for Board on Books for Young Readers, Amelia Picklewiggle and beautifully and skillfully illustrated by Anthony Grimaldi. Your child will not want to put this book down.
author: Patti Petrone Miller Petrone Miller
